replies.bodyText:
Thanks the review @maobaolong

On macosx, the find command is minor different with Linux, so is there another tool can replace find?

Yes, I started with a simple ls, but shellcheck complained that it couldn't work with space in the dir names (which not supposed to be used). Fixed back.

It cannot work without flekszible.yaml fiie

It's a bug in a recent addition in flekszible. Can you please use 1.8.0 version which contains the fix. (OSX test is added to Flekszible to avoid similar issues in the future)
